getGender().Description: Returns the gender of the user, if defined by the @B_com#google#android#gms#ads#AdRequest_E@.

getLocation().Description: Returns the location of the user, if defined by the @B_com#google#android#gms#ads#AdRequest_E@.

taggedForChildDirectedTreatment().Description: Returns whether the publisher indicated that the app is to be treated as child-directed for purposes of the Children’s Online Privacy Protection Act (COPPA) - If this method returns @B_com#google#android#gms#ads#mediation#MediationAdRequest#TAG_FOR_CHILD_DIRECTED_TREATMENT_TRUE_E@, it indicates that the app should be treated as child-directed for purposes of the Children’s Online Privacy Protection Act (COPPA). If this method returns @B_com#google#android#gms#ads#mediation#MediationAdRequest#TAG_FOR_CHILD_DIRECTED_TREATMENT_FALSE_E@, it indicates that the app should not be treated as child-directed for purposes of the Children’s Online Privacy Protection Act (COPPA). If this method returns @B_com#google#android#gms#ads#mediation#MediationAdRequest#TAG_FOR_CHILD_DIRECTED_TREATMENT_UNSPECIFIED_E@, it indicates that the publisher has not specified whether the app should be treated as child-directed for purposes of the Children’s Online Privacy Protection Act (COPPA).

getBirthday().Description: Returns the birthday of the user, if defined by the @B_com#google#android#gms#ads#AdRequest_E@.

isTesting().Description: Returns true if the publisher is asking for test ads. Publishers request test ads by specifying a device ID, but this information is resolved to a boolean for convenience. If no Context was provided to this class' constructor, this will always return true.

getKeywords().Description: Returns the set of keywords requested by the user, if defined by the @B_com#google#android#gms#ads#AdRequest_E@.

ClassDesc: Information about the ad to fetch for a single publisher. The information is passed through to the ad network's adapter.
